mapper.sql: id as id , account_no as accountNo , phone as phone , email as email , username as username , password as password , create_dt as createDt , update_dt as updateDt
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO power_user ( account_no, phone, email, username, password, create_dt, update_dt ) VALUES ( #{accountNo}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{username}, #{password}, #{createDt}, #{updateDt} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID

INSERT INTO power_user ( account_no, phone, email, username, password, create_dt, update_dt ) VALUES ( #{map.accountNo}, #{map.phone}, #{map.email}, #{map.username}, #{map.password}, #{map.createDt}, #{map.updateDt} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE power_user
account_no = #{accountNo},
phone = #{phone},
email = #{email},
username = #{username},
password = #{password},
create_dt = #{createDt},
update_dt = #{updateDt},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE power_user
account_no = #{map.accountNo},
phone = #{map.phone},
email = #{map.email},
username = #{map.username},
password = #{map.password},
create_dt = #{map.createDt},
update_dt = #{map.updateDt},
WHERE id = #{map.id}

UPDATE power_user
account_no = #{update.accountNo},
phone = #{update.phone},
email = #{update.email},
username = #{update.username},
password = #{update.password},
create_dt = #{update.createDt},
update_dt = #{update.updateDt},
${nativeSql}

${nativeSql}
ORDER BY

LIMIT 0,1
